name: Haulio Investment Holdings Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of container shipping platform designed to transform ports and optimize resources more effectively. The company's platform offers a marketplace that connects users with a network of carriers and other stakeholders like freight forwarders, drivers, and port operators, enabling haulers to connect and help one another through a single trusted system, enabling logistics businesses to save time and resources while improving visibility and reliability for end customers.
one_liner: Developer of container shipping platform designed to transform ports and optimize resources more effectively. The company's platform offers a marketplace that connects users with a network of carriers and other stakeholders like freight forwarders, drivers, and port operators, enabling haulers to connect and help one another through a single trusted system, enabling logistics businesses to save time and resources while improving visibility and reliability for end customers.
